_header: The soul asks right as written is in story
_description: A paraphrase of the Latin poem Cur mundus militat — eleven quatrains

CULMm441.First Lines:
þe saule haskis ryȝt as wrytin is in storie Cur wil
                    þis werde be knyȝt vnder þe kengis veynglore…
CULMm441.Last Lines:
…þe Rymis of πe Werte aray I hold my beheste old buystis
                    & nouȝt gay þat is sen of my creste
CULMm441.Editions:
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 18-19.
